message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a great deal for a product worth much more. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I'm still asking for $11,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $11,000 to $9,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10,000?

Bob, I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, but $10,000 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway *again*, but I'm firm on $10,500. This is a really good deal for you, and it's the best I can do.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement. If you're not interested, I'm going to move on to another buyer.
